name: Reverse Dungeoning
description:
Game made for the trijam 168 in under 3 hours with the Godot Engine

Don't kill no one!

Simple attack icon and Person icon by Delapouite https://delapouite.com/
Imp laughing icon and area attack icon by Lorc https://lorcblog.blogspot.com/

Goblin icon by Caro Aserción https://game-icons.net/
